title: Minister Attaf holds phone talks with his Canadian counterpart
text: The Minister of Foreign Affairs and National Community Abroad, Mr. Ahmed Attaf received, Thursday, a phone call from his Canadian counterpart, Melanie Joly, who congratulated him on his appointment as head of Algerian diplomacy.
The discussions between the two Ministers focused on the range of opportunities to promote bilateral cooperation in several areas and strengthen the political dialogue at all levels.

They also exchanged views on issues of common interest, including peace and security in Africa, the Palestinian issue in a context marked by the lack of prospects for an effective revival of the peace process, as well as the current crisis in international relations, in the context of conflict in Ukraine.

At the end of this telephone conversation, the heads of diplomacy of the two countries agreed to revitalize the Algerian-Canadian partnership in promoting peace and stability in the Sahel-Saharan region and to strengthen bilateral coordination in international fora.
